Lists System Information for the Current Machine

Source: R/system_info.R
system_info.Rd

Lists System Information for the Current Machine

system_info()

Value

A named list with elements hostname (a character string), os_info, cpu_info, and disk_free (data frames/tibbles).

Details

This function reads/queries base::Sys.info(), disk_free(), and cpu_info() on the current machine.

Examples

info <- system_info()
print(info)
#> $hostname
#> [1] "fv-az193-8"
#> 
#> $os_info
#> # A tibble: 5 × 2
#>   field   value                                              
#>   <chr>   <chr>                                              
#> 1 sysname Linux                                              
#> 2 release 6.2.0-1014-azure                                   
#> 3 version #14~22.04.1-Ubuntu SMP Wed Sep 13 16:15:26 UTC 2023
#> 4 machine x86_64                                             
#> 5 os_type unix                                               
#> 
#> $cpu_info
#> # A tibble: 31 × 2
#>    field      value                                         
#>    <chr>      <chr>                                         
#>  1 hostname   fv-az193-8                                    
#>  2 processor  0                                             
#>  3 vendor_id  vendor_GenuineIntel                           
#>  4 cpu_family 6                                             
#>  5 model      85                                            
#>  6 model_name Intel(R) Xeon(R) Platinum 8272CL CPU @ 2.60GHz
#>  7 stepping   7                                             
#>  8 microcode  0xffffffff                                    
#>  9 cpu_mhz    2593.907                                      
#> 10 cache_size 36608 KB                                      
#> # ℹ 21 more rows
#> 
#> $disk_free
#> # A tibble: 7 × 6
#>   filesystem blocks_1024     used available capacity mounted_on    
#>   <chr>            <dbl>    <dbl>     <dbl>    <dbl> <chr>         
#> 1 /dev/root     87204404 62969760  24218260     0.73 /             
#> 2 tmpfs          3544052      172   3543880     0.01 /dev/shm      
#> 3 tmpfs          1417624     1112   1416512     0.01 /run          
#> 4 tmpfs             5120        0      5120     0    /run/lock     
#> 5 /dev/sda15      106858     6186    100673     0.06 /boot/efi     
#> 6 /dev/sdb1     14341128  4194336   9396508     0.31 /mnt          
#> 7 tmpfs           708808       12    708796     0.01 /run/user/1001
#>
